channel.title: Chinese Stoneware Glazes by Joseph Grebanier
channel.description: While many of Joseph Grebanier's results seem to be quite different from the original Song glazes, this book offers an interesting account of how a ceramicist can use locally-sourced materials and UMF analyses to develop glazes. Also includes chapters on glaze calculation and how to make your own ball mill. _- Derek_ Joseph Grebanier: > This book offers a detailed account of the procedures I have developed over a period of many years in the making of stoneware glazes belonging to several different families of Chinese ceramics, especially those of the Sung era.
